ygData.subject: Re: Re: [EverQuest] Calling All Heroes
ygData.msgSnippet: The only thing that I can remember is that you can play a monster instead of your character. It said you can group with friends lower level than you by playing
ygData.messageBody:
The only thing that I can remember is that you can play a monster instead of your character. It said you can group with friends lower level than you by playing a monster that is in their level range while getting xp for your character.
I really wish they would focus on fixing the memory leaks and get rid of damage misreporting instead of making a new expansion.
luv,
-Su

======= At 2005-08-03, 13:08:00 you wrote: =======

>luv,
